subject: RE: [junit] checking for test coverage
msgSnippet: Whoops - sent my email about the Ant task before reading this one. Scott S. Macromedia
messageBody:
Whoops - sent my email about the Ant task before reading this one.

Scott S.
Macromedia

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chuck Stern [mailto:cstern@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 05, 2002 3:23 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] checking for test coverage
>
>
> There is a pre-built ANT optional task that hooks into
> JProbe's coverage
> tool (JPCoverage) but alas you have to purchase the software
> and it's not
> really JUnit specific (good or bad). An example report using
> this task can
> be found at:
>
> http://icarus.apache.org/~sbailliez/jakarta-ant/coverage/
>
> Chuck
